Summary: i was very young but i saw a circular object in the sky
trends: There have been no other sightings in Wintersville
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsi was only 6 or 7 at the time but the sight has never left my mind. i was somewhere with my babysitter playing outside when i looked up into the sky. i saw a circular object with a very short vapor trail in the shape of a v coming from the back. the vapor trail didnt leave its mark along the sky like a jet would it just looke like this 0>. i will never forget what i saw
